title: Letter: Attack letters
text:
“Letters to the editor”: Are they a secret print weapon designed to shadow political corruption? What is the private gain? Dishonest behavior the norm? Political, economic, social and environmental corruption?

The new norm is to attack and degrade the highest political office of the United States, the president. It is the norm now and forever that if you disagree or dislike the president, send a “letter to the editor.” Regardless of political affiliation, the highest office of the land has been degraded not by the sitting president but the party of opposition.

Disagree to disagree, whoever is the next president will receive the same treatment as President Trump.

Through political corruption, funds intended for public projects have been misdirected and used to attack the president of the United States. “Letters to the editor” encourage the immoral act of attacking people’s opposing views.

DEBBIE SARGENT

Epsom
